Text: It`s that kind of thanks i love to hear and keep me on this site .... because of some few thanks i am still here  :-) I can see how many people download my torrent and the thanks is below 1% ----If it going lower i will leave Tpb  :-(

Huge thanks Merzedes. ... I suppose one thing to bear in mind is that there may be a lot of people finding your TPB uploads through another torrent search site? And thus not in a position to say thanks. Or even to see your comments threatening to quit. ...Although I admit there must still be a large number getting them straight from TPB. Which is a shame. :(
"tenenbaum" dont worry i have your mail.adr so i will tell you where i am going if i leave tpb  :-)  Cheers
Thanks Merzedes, these two are a pair of hotties.

Thanks great work.
The problem is you don't have to be a member or log in to download stuff,therefore it's impossible to post any comments doing so.
Thanks so much merzedes we do think you are the best ot TPB!
